title: Expecting all properties to be returned when creating a SESSION RESULT
gherkin:
When the user creates a "SESSION RESULT" "1st place" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | position | 1 | number |
  | race_number | 44 | string |
  | driver_name | Lewis Hamilton | string |
  | team_name | Mercedes | string |
  | race_time | PT1H23M45.678S | string |
  | laps | 51 | number |
  | status | finished | string |
  | points | 25 | number |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | position | 1 | number |
  | race_number | 44 | string |
  | driver_name | Lewis Hamilton | string |
  | team_name | Mercedes | string |
  | race_time | PT1H23M45.678S | string |
  | laps | 51 | number |
  | status | finished | string |
  | points | 25 | number |
